label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • You now lose one gold per second if you haven't picked a hero after the selection timer runs out inAll Pick

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • All Pick selection time increased from 60 to 75

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • All Pick pre-creep time reduced from 90 to 75

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Roshanno longer stops upgrading his hp/damage/armor at 45 minutes

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Roshan upgrade rate increased by 20%

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Roshan bounty rescaled from 105-600 to 150-400

label: Alchemist
descriptionHtml:
• Nightvisionreduced from 1400 to 800
  • Unstable Concoctionmaximum shaking duration reduced from 7 to 5.5
    • Max power is still reached after 5 seconds
  • Unstable Concoction no longer continues to get stronger while it is in the air

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml:
• Ice Vortexspell damage amplification increased from 10/15/20/25 to 15/20/25/30
  • Ice Vortex duration increased from 12 to 16
  • Ice Vortex aura stickiness increased from 0.1 to the standard 0.5 aura value

label: Anti-Mage
descriptionHtml:
• Mana Voidradius increased from 300 to 450
  • Added AoE targeting cursor for Mana Void

label: Axe
descriptionHtml:
• Base HP regenincreased from 2 to 3
  • Berserker's Callduration increased from 1.5/2/2.5/3 to 2/2.4/2.8/3.2
  • Berserker's Call cooldown rescaled from 10 to 16/14/12/10

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml: • Attack animation time improved from 0.5 to 0.3

label: Beastmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Call of the WildHawkduration reduced from 60/70/80/80 to 60
  • Call of the WildBoarduration reduced from 70/80/90 to 60
  • Call of the Wild no longer destroys previous summons on cast

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml:
• ThirstBonus Speed and damage rescaled from 7/14/21/28 to 5/15/25/35
  • Blood Bathnow gives the full hero kill benefit (instead of only half) if he is within the 325 AoE when a hero dies

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml: • Primal Splitcooldown reduced from 180/160/140 to 140/120/100

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml: • Base damage reduced by 4

label: Broodmother
descriptionHtml:
• Can no longer leave the map boundaries
    • This also affects all other heroes with free pathing, such as Spectre, Batrider, etc.
  • Spin Webno longer provides 200 vision
  • Free pathing is now removed when enemies have vision over you
    • For example, if you are revealed byDustand the enemy has vision over you, you will not be able to run into the trees

label: Centaur Warrunner
descriptionHtml: • Stampedecooldown reduced from 120/90/60 to 90/75/60

label: Clockwerk
descriptionHtml: • Hits required to killPower Cogsrescaled from 3 to 2/2/2/3

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml: • Base intelligence reduced by 3

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml: • Ion Shellcooldown reduced from 10 to 9

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml: • Weaveduration increased from 20 to 24

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• Exorcismcooldown increased from 100 to 115
  • SilenceAoE increased from 350 to 425

label: Dragon Knight
descriptionHtml: • Dragon Tailcooldown rescaled from 9 to 12/11/10/9

label: Drow Ranger
descriptionHtml: • ReworkedSilence

label: Earth Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Stone Remnantrecharge timer increased from 25 to 35
  • Geomagnetic Gripnow does a 2/3/4/5 second silence instead of a 1/1.5/2/2.5 second stun
  • Geomagnetic Grip damage rescaled from 125 to 100/150/200/250
  • Boulder Smashdamage rescaled from 100/150/200/250 to 125
  • Boulder Smash now does a 0.75/1.25/1.75/2.25 second stun instead of a 3.5/4/4.5/5 second silence
  • Boulder Smash radius from 225 to 200
  • Rolling Bouldernow also gets interrupted if disabled during the initial 0.6 rolling charge, instead of only while its moving
  • Geomagnetic Grip now kills trees along the path of a dragged allied hero
  • Targeting someone directly with Boulder Smash will now be blocked by Linken's Sphere
  • Fixed being able to cast Geomagnetic Grip on magic immune allies
  • Fixed Boulder Smash being able to target Magic Immune units
  • Fixed Rolling Boulder travel distance going further than intended if you use a Stone Remnant near the end of the roll

label: Earthshaker
descriptionHtml:
• Base movement speed increased from 300 to 310
  • Strength gain increased from 2.5 to 2.9

label: Enchantress
descriptionHtml: • Base armor reduced by 1

label: Enigma
descriptionHtml:
• Black HoleAoE increased from 375 to 400
  • Black Hole cast range increased from 250 to 275

label: Faceless Void
descriptionHtml:
• Chronospherecooldown reduced from 120/110/100 to 120/100/80
  • You now have 1000 movement speed and phase while you are in Chronosphere
  • Time Walkmana cost reduced from 120 to 90

label: Huskar
descriptionHtml:
• Burning Spearduration increased from 7 to 8
  • Inner Vitalitybonus heal below 40% increased from 15/30/45/60% of primary attribute to 30/45/60/75%
  • Inner Vitality cast range increased from 450 to 550

label: Invoker
descriptionHtml:
• Forge Spiritsarmor reduced from 2/3/4/5/6/7/8 to 0/1/2/3/4/5/6
  • Forge Spirits attack range reduced from 300➜900 to 300➜690
  • EMPburn increased from 100➜400 to 100➜550
  • EMP delay from 3.7➜2 to 2.6
  • Alacritymana cost reduced from 75 to 45
  • Ghost Walkmovement speed from -30/-25/-20/-15/-10/-5/0 to -30/-20/-10/0/10/20/30

label: Jakiro
descriptionHtml:
• Ice Pathdamage rescaled from 25/50/75/100 to 50
  • Liquid FireDPS increased from 10/15/20/25 to 15/20/25/30
  • Dual Breathburn and slow duration increased from 4 to 5 seconds
  • Dual Breath DPS increased from 5/10/15/20 to 16/36/56/76
  • Dual Breath damage interval improved from every 1 second to every 0.5 seconds
  • Dual Breath Attack Speed slow increased from -20 to -30
  • Removed initial impact damage from Dual Breath
    • Total damage on Dual Breath is now rescaled from 90/180/270/360 to 80/180/280/380

label: Juggernaut
descriptionHtml: • Blade Furycooldown reduced from 30/28/26/24 to 30/27/24/21

label: Keeper of the Light
descriptionHtml: • Mana Leakstun duration increased from 1.3/1.6/1.9/2.2 to 1.5/2/2.5/3

label: Legion Commander
descriptionHtml:
• Moment of Couragenow only procs one extra lifesteal attack
    • It would previously sometimes cause multiple extra lifesteal attacks per proc
  • Moment of Courage buff grace period increased from 0.5 to 1 seconds
  • Moment of Courage cooldown reduced from 1.2 to 0.9

label: Leshrac
descriptionHtml:
• Lightning Stormjumps from 4/6/7/8 to 4/5/6/7
  • Lightning Storm damage from 80/145/205/265 to 80/140/200/260
  • Lightning Storm cooldown reduced from 5.5 to 4
  • Lightning Storm mana cost reduced from 100/115/130/145 to 90/100/110/120

label: Lina
descriptionHtml:
• Dragon SlaveInitial/Final AoE increased from 275/150 to 275/200
  • Fiery Soulduration increased from 7 to 9
  • Fiery Soul movement speed increased from 4/5/6/7% to 5/6/7/8%

label: Lion
descriptionHtml: • Aghanim's Scepter now causesFinger of Deathto hit units within a 200 AoE of the primary target

label: Lone Druid
descriptionHtml: • Spirit Bear'sEntangleis no longer anOrb Effect

label: Lycan
descriptionHtml:
• Lycan WolvesFade Time decreased from 3 to 1.7
  • Level 3 Lycan Wolves now haveInvisibility
  • Level 4 Lycan Wolves now have a passive ability that gives them 15 HP regen

label: Magnus
descriptionHtml: • Base intelligence increased by 2

label: Medusa
descriptionHtml: • Mana Shielddamage absorption increased from 0.75/1.25/1.75/2.25 to 1/1.5/2/2.5

label: Meepo
descriptionHtml:
• Divided We Standlevel requirement reduced from 4/11/18 to 3/10/17
  • Divided We Stand now passively reduces your revive timer by 10%/20%/30%

label: Morphling
descriptionHtml: • You can now cast and attack while inWaveform

label: Nature's Prophet
descriptionHtml: • Wrath of Naturemana cost increased from 150/200/250 to 175/225/275

label: Necrophos
descriptionHtml: • Death Pulsenow hits units inFog of War

label: Night Stalker
descriptionHtml: • Crippling Fear's night miss chance increased from 40 to 50%

label: Nyx Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Cast Range onImpalenow matches the travel range
    • This has no impact on the length or the area the Impale covers

label: Ogre Magi
descriptionHtml:
• Unrefined Fireblastmana cost changed from 400 to 60% of your current mana
    • You can always cast this spell
    • If you have only 100 mana remaining, the spell costs 60 mana

label: Omniknight
descriptionHtml:
• Degen Aurastickiness increased from 1 to 2 seconds
    • This is how long the debuff lasts on enemies after they leave the AoE (By default Auras are 0.5 seconds)

label: Outworld Devourer
descriptionHtml: • Astral Imprisonmentcast range reduced from 550 to 500

label: Phantom Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Invisibleheroes now triggerBlur
  • Blur delay reduced from 1.5 to 0.75

label: Phoenix
descriptionHtml:
• Fire SpiritsAttack Speed slow reduced from 150 to 80/100/120/140
  • Fire Spirits can now be cast during Icarus Dive
  • Fire Spirits DPS reduced from 20/40/60/80 to 15/35/55/75
  • Icarus Diveis now interrupted if you are stunned during it

label: Queen of Pain
descriptionHtml: • Sonic WaveScepter cooldown rescaled from 100/70/40 to 40

label: Riki
descriptionHtml: • Base HP regenincreased from 0.75 to 1.5

label: Sand King
descriptionHtml: • Sand Stormradius rescaled from 275/325/375/525 to 525

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml: • Shadow Poisonmax effective stacks increased from 4 to 5

label: Shadow Shaman
descriptionHtml:
• Shacklesduration increased from 2.5/3.25/4/4.75 to 2.75/3.5/4.25/5
  • Mass Serpent Wardscan no longer trap Roshan

label: Silencer
descriptionHtml: • Global Silencecooldown reduced from 140 to 130

label: Skywrath Mage
descriptionHtml: • Mystic Flaredamage increased from 600/900/1200 to 600/1000/1400

label: Slardar
descriptionHtml: • Bashdamage increased from 40/50/60/70 to 40/60/80/100

label: Slark
descriptionHtml:
• Pouncedamage reduced from 70/140/210/280 to 60/120/180/240
  • Shadow Dancecooldown reduced from 65 to 60

label: Sniper
descriptionHtml: • Take Aimrange bonus increased from 80/160/240/320 to 100/200/300/400

label: Spirit Breaker
descriptionHtml: • You now gain vision over your target while you are castingNether Strike

label: Storm Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Base movement speed reduced from 295 to 290

label: Sven
descriptionHtml:
• Base armor increased by 3
  • Warcrycooldown reduced from 36/30/24/18 to 32/26/20/14

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml:
• Sundercooldown reduced from 160/110/60 to 120/80/40
  • Sunder is no longer partially blocked byMagic Immunity
  • Reflectioncast range increased from 250 to 275

label: Tidehunter
descriptionHtml:
• Kraken Shelldebuff threshold reduced from 600 damage taken to 600/550/500/450
  • Kraken Shell damage block increased from 9/18/27/36 to 10/20/30/40

label: Timbersaw
descriptionHtml: • Base strength reduced from 25 to 22

label: Tinker
descriptionHtml: • Added Aghanim's Scepter: DoublesLasercast range andHeat-Seeking Missilecount

label: Treant Protector
descriptionHtml:
• OvergrowthAoE increased from 625 to 675
  • Nature's Guisecast range increased from 300 to 600

label: Troll Warlord
descriptionHtml:
• Fervormax stacks rescaled from 2/3/4/5 to 4
  • Fervor attack speed per stack rescaled from 20 to 16/22/28/34

label: Tusk
descriptionHtml:
• Secondary units hit by theSnowballnow take the same impact as the primary unit
    • Damage increased from 40/80/120/160 to 80/120/160/200 and stun increased from 0.25/.5/.75/1 to 0.5/.75/1/1.25 seconds
  • Removed 50% threshold mechanic fromWalrus Punch
  • Walrus Punch base crit increased from 3× to 3.5×

label: Undying
descriptionHtml: • Soul Ripcooldown reduced from 25/20/15/10 to 24/18/12/6

label: Vengeful Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Wave of Terrorarmor reduction increased from 2/3/4/5 to 3/4/5/6

label: Venomancer
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage reduced by 5
  • Base HP regenreduced from 0.75 to the default 0.25

label: Visage
descriptionHtml:
• Base movement speed reduced by 5
  • Grave Chillmana cost rescaled from 70/80/90/100 to 100
  • Familiarsare now properlymagic immune
    • They were previously 96% magic resistant and immune to most stuns

label: Warlock
descriptionHtml: • Upheavalmax duration increased from 12 to 16

label: Windranger
descriptionHtml:
• Focus Firemana cost reduced from 200/300/400 to 150
  • Focus Fire no longer has a cast animation

label: Witch Doctor
descriptionHtml:
• MaledictAoE increased from 150 to 165
  • Voodoo Restorationinitial mana cost reduced from 25/50/75/100 to 20/30/40/50
  • Paralyzing Caskscan now bounce to units inFog of War

label: Wraith King
descriptionHtml:
• Reincarnationslow increased from 50% to 75%
  • Reincarnation slow duration increased from 4 to 5

label: Zeus
descriptionHtml: • Arc Lightningcast range increased from 700 to 850

label: Animal Courier
descriptionHtml:
• Ground Courierbounty per player reduced from 175 to 150
    • Flying Courierbounty is still 175

label: Arcane Boots
descriptionHtml: • Mana cost increased by 10

label: Battle Fury
descriptionHtml: • CleaveAoE increased from 225 to 250

label: Blink Dagger
descriptionHtml:
• Blink no longer has a mana cost
    • It previously had a mana cost of 75

label: Bottle
descriptionHtml:
• Can now be used on your allies by holding down the Control key
    • This can only be used to regenerate allies, not transferRunes

label: Diffusal Blade
descriptionHtml: • Agility bonus increased from 22/26 to 25/30

label: Drum of Endurance
descriptionHtml:
• Number of charges increased from 4 to 5
  • Recipe cost increased from 800 to 875

label: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
descriptionHtml: • Cyclonecooldown reduced from 25 to 23

label: Force Staff
descriptionHtml:
• Forcetravel speed is reduced
    • It now takes 0.4 seconds instead of 0.3 to move the full distance

label: Iron Branch
descriptionHtml: • Gold cost reduced from 53 to 50

label: Mask of Madness
descriptionHtml: • Lifestealincreased from 17% to 20%

label: Mjollnir
descriptionHtml:
• Changed the area type that is used whenStatic Chargehit units
    • It no longer uses a cone to determine the valid targets, but an AoE of the same distance instead (900)

label: Necronomicon
descriptionHtml:
• Necronomicon units bounty increased from 100/125/150 to 100/150/200
  • Necronomicon units armor reduced from 6/8/10 to 4
  • Necronomicon cooldown increased from 80 to 95

label: Observer Ward
descriptionHtml: • Can be targeted on allies to transfer one charge

label: Radiance
descriptionHtml: • Attack damage bonus increased from 60 to 65

label: Refresher Orb
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost reduced from 1875 to 1800

label: Ring of Aquila
descriptionHtml: • Agility bonus increased from 6 to 9

label: Rod of Atos
descriptionHtml: • HP bonus increased from 325 to 350

label: Sange and Yasha
descriptionHtml:
• Sange and Yasha slow duration increased from 4 to 5 seconds
  • Sange and Yasha slow increased from 30 to 32%

label: Sentry Ward
descriptionHtml: • Can be targeted on allies to transfer one charge

label: Shadow Amulet
descriptionHtml:
• Fade delay improved from 1.8 to 1.5
  • Can now be used on allies
    • Has a 600 cast range
    • Goes into cooldown for 10 seconds when used on allies

label: Shiva's Guard
descriptionHtml:
• Arctic Blastrange increased from 719 to 900
  • Arctic Blast speed increased from 300 to 350

label: Smoke of Deceit
descriptionHtml: • Duration decreased from 40 to 35

label: Teleport Scrolls
descriptionHtml:
• Stacking delay decreased from 3/5/6/7/8 to 3/5/5.5/6/6.5
  • Max targeting range increased from 525 to 575
    • This is how far you can teleport to from aTower

label: Tranquil Boots
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed increased from 85 to 90
  • HP Regen increased from 10 to 12
    • Both of these are while Tranquil Boots is not disabled

label: Veil of Discord
descriptionHtml: • Strength/Agility/Damage bonus increased from 3 to 6
